caption:
“Rest is resistance.”

Reflection:
To pause is to protest the pace of the world. Stillness declares trust in a God who sustains all things.

Commentary:
This reflection reframes rest as spiritual strength. In a restless culture, Sabbath becomes an act of faith and freedom.
